page.title: 17Church life in Seaton
page.content:
Seaton church is part of a united parish with Lyddington and Stoke Dry The Rector lives at Lyddington where he is the vicar and lives in the vicarage.Accordingly services are held to fit in with times in the two villages. { Here is the pattern of services:-} June 2 9.45 Holy Communion June 9 9.45 Morning Prayer June 16 9.45 Holy Communion June 23 11.00 Family Service June 30 6.00 Songs Of Praise
There is a mid-week Holy Communion at 10.45 every Wednesday.Seaton Sunday School meets at 11.00 every Sunday in the church.
The Flower arranging and the church cleaning are done by the women of Seaton on a rota basis.
